name: Only One Coin (of each color)
description:
Created with Unity 2019.2 for the GMTK Game Jam

Theme: Only One.

Controls
Movement = Arrow Keys or WASD
Jump = Space
Crouch = Left Shift or Mouse Click
Camera = Move the Mouse

Assets used
